name: todo-app
title: Todo App
desc: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop reordering for anyone wanting an extra test.

name: product-page
title: Product Page
desc: A beautiful realisitic product page to demonstrate state management, resusability of components, responsive design, and efficient website layout.

name: weather-app
title: Weather App
desc: An aesthetic user-friendly app with some cool features for determining the current weather of any location and also forecasting weather conditions.
